name: Woz's Dice Roller
description:
Woz's Dice Roller!

A simple game tool for RPG, LARP & other dice based games.

FEATURES:

  • Roll up to 999 dice!
  • Each die can have up to 999 sides!
  • Autocalculates Max Potential Roll!
  • Autocalculates Roll Percentage!
  • Autocalculates Roll Total!
  • Double Roll Prevention Feature!
  • Counts Number of Rolls!
  • No Advertisements!

Another cool #Android #Game #Application by Kevin Loring of Bangor, Maine!
